landingPage.subTitle: Tidy up your {Following} list on Twitter.
landingPage.description: {title} analyses your Following list on Twitter telling you which accounts haven't been active in a specific time   frame (one week, two weeks, one month, three months, six months  and a year). You can then unfollow individual accounts, selected accounts or all at once.
footer.footerText: TidyTweets is free and open-source software, if you find it useful perhaps consider
dashboard.followingText2: (this might take a while depending on how many accounts you follow)
dashboard.following.followingIntro2: accounts that have not been active in the last
dashboard.following.followingActionText: What would you want to do next?
dashboard.following.followingListEmptyMe: Try a different time frame above.
